attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned have lost all confidence in Her Majesty's Government and request that parliament be suspended to allow a fresh election.

We feel that Her Majesty's Government has rules without legitimacy with issue ranging from the re-organisation of the NHS and the rise in tuition fees, neither were manifesto pledges, or were manifesto promises to the contra
Furthermore we feel that this Government has lied to the electorate, they have miss represented facts and have conducted themselves in their own interest.

We feel the only solution is the calling of a fresh General Election.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
